tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Appointment started on time. The way doctor greats and understands the problem was really wonderful experience. Doctor has great patience in listening and he explained me the exact reason for the problem. Also he provided an apt consultation. Highly recommend him to anyone who is looking for a good Orthopedist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The Doctor is very friendly and soft spoken. He listens to your complain patiently and even explains the diagnosis in layman terms. He suggested me a shoulder belt which is very easy to remove. He is well informed about latest medical products in the market. An important thing to note is, he will not ask for unnecessary xrays and treatments. He will only suggest required procedures. He is not after your money unlike other doctors.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was really good ..he explained us why it develops and how to be careful .. however he prescribed some injections which the nurse over there gave. she didn't give it properly and I developed pain , swelling,redness over the place where she gave me injection . Now they are saying to use antibiotics for a week and if doesn't reduce they may have to cut it and clear the puss. **** *** *** ******* *** * ***** ** **** ******* *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Warm friendliness with exceptional memory about every patient 
Detailed diagnostic conversation 
Passionate and in depth subject matter expertise 
Not jumping into conclusions and not advising for unnessary investigations and medicines 
Plus more.. I haven't experienced such a friendly and thorough  professional/ Doctor.  Very strongly recommend this orthopaedic specialist

tags: Wait time,
review: I never went there always find difficult in booking the appointment with the Ortho  Dr.Vivek, since 3 days i have been trying to book and have been unsuccessful. He sticks to his timing and cannot wait for the patients, He moves to other clinics. *** ***** ** ***** ** **** ** ***** ** ****** *** ***** *** ******** ** ***** ***** *** *** **** ********* The receptionist has to call the doc, only when the patient arrives and arrives only after that. Why do you keep wait the patients with pains.  ** ***** ** ****** *** ** ****** *** ***** ***** ***** My really bad experience the first time. *** ***** ** *** **** **** *** *** ** ********** *** **** ************* *** *** ****** ********* *** ***** *** *** ** **** *** *********
